text: "Made My Day" is a 1983 song by New Zealand singer Tim Finn and is the second single from his debut studio album Escapade. It went to number 22 in Australia. ==Track listing== ;Australian/New Zealand 7" single (K-9186) *A. "Made My Day" - 3:23 *B. "Another Chance" - 4:48 ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Tim Finn songs
title: Made My Day
